[ANESTHESIA]

[DESCRIPTION]

- Scope: Pentax EB-1990i

Procedure 3: Radial EBUS
- View: Concentric

Procedure 4: Transbronchial Biopsy
- Forceps biopsies: 6
- TBNA passes: 3

- ROSE result: Adequate lymphocytes, no malignancy

Specimens: Cytology, cell block, surgical pathology, BAL cultures
Complications: None
